card.name: Duskmire Leech
card.description: There are things worse than mosquitoes in the muck beneath the Duskmire.

card.name: Carrion Crawler
card.description: Give them a few hours and they'll eat everything but the heart.

card.name: Faerie Dragon
card.description: They may not steal sheep or level towns, but they do have a nasty bite.

card.name: Hunting Dog
card.description: It takes more than a simple spell to throw off their scent.

card.name: Kiirish Sellsword
card.description: A handful of gold for a sword by your side: not a bad trade if you have a lot of enemies.

card.name: Half-Dragon Bladespinner
card.description: It takes inhuman strength and precision to spin a blade for that long.

card.name: Unstable Construct
card.description: Assembled from rubble and pure energy, it could burst apart at the softest touch.

card.name: Dire Wolf
card.description: Once you hear their howls, all you can do is pray they're after someone else.

card.name: Greyhoof Pikeman
card.description: More often than not, those who threaten the tribe find themselves on the end of a Greyhoof pike.

card.name: Greyhoof Chieftan
card.description: Strongest of all the centaur, he bested many to gain his title.

card.name: Karani Shaman
card.description: The Karani are timid explorers, except in the realm of voodoo magics.

card.name: Karani Packlord
card.description: Pity those who threaten its kin.

card.name: Giant Centipede
card.description: What were they feeding that thing??

card.name: Fire Elemental
card.description: They're born when spent mana merges with flame.

card.name: Earth Elemental
card.description: Even the ground beneath our feet can be changed with enough mana.

card.name: Wind Elemental
card.description: A swirling tempest starving for more energy, it was born of wind and mana.

card.name: Water Elemental
card.description: All that excess mana has to go somewhere. Next time don't wash your car with it.

card.name: Hill Giant
card.description: They're as massive as a boulder. As smart as one too.

card.name: Arakki Battlelord
card.description: Master tacticians, the Arakki thrive on the front lines.

card.name: Storm Giant
card.description: The winds pick up, the waves thrash about, and from the fog he emerges.

card.name: Stone Giant
card.description: Besides the occasional meal, they spend most of their time lying dormant in caves.

card.name: Gargantuan Treant
card.description: Its duty is to protect the forests. They are usually quite passive, unless you start a fire.

card.name: Chained Goliath
card.description: They used to prey on humanity, now they're our slaves.

card.name: Demigod
card.description: The power of a god with the temperment of a human. What could possibly go wrong?

card.name: Angry Walrus
card.description: Roughly 15.4 times stronger than an average walrus.

card.name: Elder Dragon
card.description: Its claws can pierce through stone; its roar can shatter bones.

card.name: World Guardian
card.description: Built in The Forgotten Ages. They awaken when the world's fate is threatened.

card.name: Fireball
card.description: Do 2 damage to the targeted creature.

card.description: Do 2 damage to the targeted creature.

card.description: Heal 2 hp of the targeted creature.

card.description: Draw 1 card.
